Uses of Interface
org.example.timer.DataHandler

Packages that use DataHandler
Package
Description
org.example.timer
This package contains classes and interfaces for a timer application that displays the time elapsed since the start of the program and outputs a message every 5 seconds.

  • Uses of DataHandler in org.example.timer

    Classes in org.example.timer that implement DataHandler
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    CollectionDataHandler
    The CollectionDataHandler class implements the DataHandler interface to handle data using an in-memory collection.
    class 
    FileDataHandler
    The FileDataHandler class implements the DataHandler interface to handle data using a file.
    Constructors in org.example.timer with parameters of type DataHandler
    Modifier
    Constructor
    Description
     
    SchedulerController(DataHandler dataHandler)
    Constructs a new SchedulerController with the specified DataHandler.
     
    SchedulerController(DataHandler dataHandler, ScheduledExecutorService scheduler)
    Constructs a new SchedulerController with the specified DataHandler and ScheduledExecutorService.
